short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the real news behind the doublespeak with the Shovel's Australian politics translator for Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Shovel's election translator helps you cut through the crap and get to the core of what politicians really mean. Thanks to this translator you can see terms like 'house prices', 'Malcolm Turnbull' and 'Christopher Pyne' magically transformed into 'avocado prices', 'Richy McRichface' and 'the most annoying man in the world'. Developed specifically with an Australia audience in mind, this is the perfect tool to help voters get through the 2016 election campaign without going crazy.
